title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is not displayed, even though it is saved in the xml source. The expected result is that the target bookmark is displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
SR: Ensure that the selected bookmark is properly displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog after reopening it.
